Choose this place to stay no matter the reason for your visit. It’s extremely comfortable, safe, and convenient for whatever you’ll be doing.

What a superb stay we had at the Chessie B room!! We were in visiting my family for the holidays, and it was so nice to have our own space while in town. It is so nicely appointed and everything about it welcomes you in like a ‘warm hug’ :-)
Stephen is such a wonderful host. He was super responsive to all of my questions and messages, and he was very accommodating when we requested an early check-in at the last minute. He met us upon our arrival to make sure everything was to our liking and to point out where everything essential was located. He provided lots of recommendations for restaurants both within walking distance and those a bit farther away, as well as pointing out the wine and whiskey bar and tap room that are just a stone’s throw away. He made sure to provide extra towels and linens, if needed, as we were staying for a week.
The location of the Chessie B room is so ideal. It is located in Heritage Station, which is a historic train station in downtown Huntington that is now filled with small, local businesses (including the wine and whiskey bar I mentioned above, as well a lovely local bakery and gift shop). Pullman Plaza is just a little over a block away, and the downtown businesses are well within walking distance.
The apartment is very comfortable and is so quiet........it allowed us to have a peaceful space for working while in town. It was sparkling clean upon our arrival, and our kitchenette was stocked with essentials such as coffee, tea and bottled water. Lots of interesting bits of history are found throughout, and there are some beautiful antique pieces throughout the space. The bathroom was well stocked with toiletries and plenty of towels. There is also plenty of free parking at hand in the parking lot for Heritage Station.
We loved our stay at the Chessie B room and hope to stay again whenever we are back in a Huntington :-)
